curryDishes.name: Fancy Apple Curry
curryDishes.description: A simple curry that lets the natural sweetness of its apples shine.

curryDishes.name: Grilled Tail Curry
curryDishes.description: The tasty tail elevates the flavor of the curry roux to the next level.

curryDishes.name: Solar Power Tomato Curry
curryDishes.description: A curry made using tomatoes that have turned bright red in the sun.

curryDishes.name: Dream Eater Butter Curry
curryDishes.description: The ingredients in this curry all share a connection to deep sleep.

curryDishes.name: Spicy Leek Curry
curryDishes.description: The roasted leeks are fragrant and sweet as fruit, perfectly balancing the spicy roux.

curryDishes.name: Spore Mushroom Curry
curryDishes.description: A curry that puts you to sleep just as surely as the move Spore.

curryDishes.name: Egg Bomb Curry
curryDishes.description: A curry made with oodles of love. Its ingredients are geared toward kids.

curryDishes.name: Hearty Cheeseburger Curry
curryDishes.description: This voluminous curry is large enough to astound even a Snorlax.

curryDishes.name: Soft Potato Chowder
curryDishes.description: A thick chowder made from potatoes boiled until practically melting.

curryDishes.name: Simple Chowder
curryDishes.description: You can really taste the richness of the milk in this simple chowder.

curryDishes.name: Beanburger Curry
curryDishes.description: The tender bean patties are the stars of the show in this curry.

curryDishes.name: Mild Honey Curry
curryDishes.description: A mild curry containing plenty of honey. Kids gobble it down!

curryDishes.name: Ninja Curry
curryDishes.description: This tofu curry is said to have been a favorite dish of ninjas.

curryDishes.name: Drought Katsu Curry
curryDishes.description: The freshly-fried cutlet has a nice sparkle to it.

curryDishes.name: Melty Omelette Curry
curryDishes.description: This curry is topped with a masterfully-cooked omelette that simply melts in the mouth.

curryDishes.name: Bulk Up Bean Curry
curryDishes.description: A hearty curry packed with nutrients needed for bulking up.

curryDishes.name: Limber Corn Stew
curryDishes.description: The milk and corn in this creamy stew have a mild, gentle sweetness.

curryDishes.name: Inferno Corn Keema Curry
curryDishes.description: This curry's infernal spiciness kicks in after the sweetness of the corn.

curryDishes.name: Dizzy Punch Spicy Curry
curryDishes.description: A rhythmic one-two punch of sweet and spicy flavors attacks your taste buds, finishing with a hint of bitterness.

curryDishes.name: Hidden Power Perk-Up Stew
curryDishes.description: A chunky tomato stew for a decadent start to your day.

saladDishes.name: Slowpoke Tail Pepper Salad
saladDishes.description: The mouth-tinglingly spicy pepper highlights the sweetness of the tail.

saladDishes.name: Spore Mushroom Salad
saladDishes.description: A salad rich in minerals that improve the quality of sleep.

saladDishes.name: Snow Cloak Caesar Salad
saladDishes.description: A bacon salad topped with a generous snowy sprinkling of cheese.

saladDishes.name: Gluttony Potato Salad
saladDishes.description: This potato salad contains just a hint of flavor from the Fancy Apples.

saladDishes.name: Water Veil Tofu Salad
saladDishes.description: A salad topped with wobbly cubes of tofu.

saladDishes.name: Superpower Extreme Salad
saladDishes.description: A hefty salad that provides all your daily nutrients at once.

saladDishes.name: Bean Ham Salad
saladDishes.description: This simple salad features ham made from Bean Sausages.

saladDishes.name: Snoozy Tomato Salad
saladDishes.description: The Snoozy Tomatoes in this simple salad are a great aid for sleep.

saladDishes.name: Moomoo Caprese Salad
saladDishes.description: A basic salad containing only cheese, tomatoes, and a splash of oil.

saladDishes.name: Contrary Chocolate Meat Salad
saladDishes.description: The savory sauce and sweet chocolate sauce let you enjoy a mix of flavors.

saladDishes.name: Overheat Ginger Salad
saladDishes.description: This salad's special ginger dressing warms you through and through.

saladDishes.name: Fancy Apple Salad
saladDishes.description: A simple salad accentuated by a mashed apple dressing.

saladDishes.name: Immunity Leek Salad
saladDishes.description: The crisp leeks in this salad do wonders for the immune system.

saladDishes.name: Dazzling Apple Cheese Salad
saladDishes.description: The simple seasoning keeps the focus on the sublime pairing of ingredients.

saladDishes.name: Ninja Salad
saladDishes.description: Ninjas cannot resist the flavor of this tofu salad. It's eaten in a flash!

saladDishes.name: Heat Wave Tofu Salad
saladDishes.description: A tofu salad covered in bright red spicy sauce.

saladDishes.name: Greengrass Salad
saladDishes.description: A salad made of fresh vegetables - all harvested on Greengrass Isle.

saladDishes.name: Calm Mind Fruit Salad
saladDishes.description: The refreshing sweetness of this fruit salad soothes the soul.

saladDishes.name: Fury Attack Corn Salad
saladDishes.description: When eating this salad, you should start by attacking the mound of corn.

saladDishes.name: Cross Chop Salad
saladDishes.description: A chopped salad delicately made with fine repeated cuts.

saladDishes.name: Defiant Coffee-Dressed Salad
saladDishes.description: A chef worked defiantly to perfect this salad with coffee dressing, tweaking the recipe again and again.

dessertDishes.name: Fluffy Sweet Potatoes
dessertDishes.description: These perfectly ripe potatoes don't rely on honey to deliver a sweet kick.

dessertDishes.name: Steadfast Ginger Cookies
dessertDishes.description: These cookies give you the power to tackle hardships without crumbling.

dessertDishes.name: Fancy Apple Juice
dessertDishes.description: A rich juice containing only the very best apples.

dessertDishes.name: Craft Soda Pop
dessertDishes.description: A highly carbonated artisan soda.

dessertDishes.name: Ember Ginger Tea
dessertDishes.description: Apples have been added to the spicy ginger, helping the tea go down easily.

dessertDishes.name: Jigglypuff's Fruity Flan
dessertDishes.description: A very special flan that's as springy as a balloon.

dessertDishes.name: Lovely Kiss Smoothie
dessertDishes.description: A relaxing drink that soothes your weariness and envelops you in sleep.

dessertDishes.name: Lucky Chant Apple Pie
dessertDishes.description: The chunky pieces of apple in this pie are lucky finds!

dessertDishes.name: Neroli's Restorative Tea
dessertDishes.description: A special restorative tea made by Professor Neroli.

dessertDishes.name: Sweet Scent Chocolate Cake
dessertDishes.description: Neither people nor Pokémon can resist the lure of this cake's sweet aroma.

dessertDishes.name: Warm Moomoo Milk
dessertDishes.description: Moomoo Milk that has been heated to further draw out its sweetness.

dessertDishes.name: Cloud Nine Soy Cake
dessertDishes.description: A soy cake with a nice, light texture.

dessertDishes.name: Hustle Protein Smoothie
dessertDishes.description: A glass of this sweet smoothie goes down a treat after a training session.

dessertDishes.name: Stalwart Vegetable Juice
dessertDishes.description: An easy-to-make juice with natural sweet and sour flavors.

dessertDishes.name: Big Malasada
dessertDishes.description: A special fried bread made using a recipe from the Alola region.

dessertDishes.name: Huge Power Soy Donuts
dessertDishes.description: Soy donuts fried to crisp perfection. They're bodybuilders' friends.

dessertDishes.name: Explosion Popcorn
dessertDishes.description: Prepared in an instant with enough heat to cause an explosion

dessertDishes.name: Teatime Corn Scones
dessertDishes.description: This flaky scone is most delicious when paired with an equal amount of apple ginger jam.

dessertDishes.name: Petal Dance Chocolate Tart
dessertDishes.description: A tricksy tart that scatters flower petals when you eat it

dessertDishes.name: Flower Gift Macarons
dessertDishes.description: These macarons are perfect to give as a gift - they always make the recipient smile

dessertDishes.name: Early Bird Coffee Jelly
dessertDishes.description: This slightly bitter coffee jelly can help wake you up faster.

dessertDishes.name: Zing Zap Spiced Cola
dessertDishes.description: This cola's strong bite will jolt you awake!
